thread.title: Quiz! Peter Crouch becomes 26th player to reach 100 Premier League goals - can you name all 26?
thread.title_full: Quiz! Peter Crouch becomes 26th player to reach 100 Premier League goals - can you name all 26?

author: Richard Innes
title: Quiz! Peter Crouch becomes 26th player to reach 100 Premier League goals - can you name all 26?
text:
100 for Crouchie (and we're not talking about his inner leg measurement) (Photo: Getty)     
No wonder Peter Crouch brought back the robot. 
The gangly lanky veteran Stoke striker had a very good reason for reviving his infamous goal celebration after scoring in The Potters' 1-1 draw with Everton: it was the 100th goal of his Premier League career. 
To give you some idea of the significance of that landmark, Crouch is only the 26th player to reach a century of Premier League goals. Which got us thinkingâ€¦ 
How quickly could list all 26? 
The quiz below gives you just 10 minutes to do exactly that. To help you on the way, we have told you when each player scored their 100th, and who they were playing for at the time. All you need to type in is a surname. 
Good luck!
